name: Untitled dungeon game (mrDock21)
description:
Made by: Me, ScorpionSensual and Martel

Untitled dungeon game is an XCOM-like strategy game that we made for a college project. The game is a little buggy, but we hope you find something of value in it. The only missing feature in this version (WebGL) is multiplayer since it doesn't work on the browser.

Thanks for playing! And don't forget to share your thoughts in the comments! :D
